transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello. Sir, is Ved Pathak ji speaking, sir?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Ved ji, good morning. I am Praveen, speaking from IndiaMART office.

Customer: Good morning.

Executive: Haan sir, yesterday you were making an incoming call, but could not respond. So, can you tell me what help out can I do, sir?

Customer: Lead kyun nahi aa rahe hai?

Executive: Okay, lead nahi aa rahi hai?

Customer: Hmm. Pop-up message aa raha hai, do second mein lead gayab ho rahi hai. Kya hai?

Executive: Achha.

Executive: Lead sold out ho rahi hai, yeh aap kehna chah rahe hai, sir?

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Do second ke andar, pop-up message aaya nahi ki lead gayab ho rahi hai.

Executive: Achha.

Executive: Bata de raha hu sir, ek second rukiye.

Executive: Sir, apna dealing kaha pe hai? All over India hai ya sirf Maharashtra target karte hai?

Customer: All over India.

Executive: Okay.

Executive: Aapne 5 tarikh mein kal do lead purchase kiya tha sir, keval.

Customer: Woh dekho, purani lead hai.

Executive: Haan, kal ki lead, kal ki lead. Jaise jo new lead aati hai na. Hmm hmm. Abhi pop-up message aaya aur main purchase karne ja raha hu. Vaisi lead ek bhi nahi hai.

Executive: Achha.

Executive: Pop-up aa raha hai lekin woh sold out ho rahi hai, yeh kehna chah rahe ho?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Okay. Woh haath se hi rehta hai.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm. Do second ke andar hi.

Executive: Ek second rukiye ga line pe.

Executive: Sir, thoda bata sakte hai kaun se matlab product line mein aapko lead zyada se zyada?

Customer: Kya bol rahe ho?

Executive: Matlab kis product line mein zyada lead sold out ho rahi hai?

Customer: Mera LED video wall ka hi hai.

Executive: Haan, jaise sir, ek dekho, aap agar mobile application open karenge, ek 4 minute pehle ki lead abhi dikh rahi hai account mein. Aap aapko show ho rahi hai yeh? Ek baar consume kijiye ga isko.

Customer: Yeh kaun sa hai? West Bengal.

Executive: Haan, West Bengal wali.

Customer: Haan, ho rahi hai.

Executive: Aap usko contact by now pe click karke uthaiye.

Customer: Utha liya, success bhi kar diya.

Executive: Achha, utha liya aapne?

Customer: Hmm. Haan, aur ek yeh Bhatinda wali dekhiye sir, 19 minute pehle hai.

Customer: Nahi, woh nahi kuch kaam ki. Woh nahi hai.

Executive: Achha. Toh usko na aap dustbin ke icon pe not relevant mark kar dijiye.

Customer: Nahi, fake hai.

Executive: Haan, toh not relevant pe usko submit kar dijiye na. Toh us tarike ki lead phir dikhegi nahi aapko.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Ji. Aur ek 27 minute pehle aaya ki hai sir yeh wali?

Customer: Hmm?

Executive: Yeh Kerala hai, Malappuram, Kerala.

Executive: Sir, main aap se ek request karna chahunga, possible hai sir video meet pe 10 to 15 minutes ke liye connect ho sakte hai? Main help kar paunga.

Customer: Abhi toh main abhi bahar hu.

Executive: Achha, kab tak possible hai sir?

Customer: Haan, main call karta hu.

Executive: Haan, main call aapko kar lunga, thoda bata dijiye kitne time mein?

Customer: Ek dedh ghante baad. Nahi toh shaam ko 6 baje ke baad.

Executive: Sir, 6 baje tak toh hum logo ki chutti ho jati hai.

Customer: Achha. Haan. Thik hai, main call karke batata hu aapko. Kyunki meeting hai meri. Thik hai, phir main bata sakta hu.

Executive: Thik hai sir, call karta hu. Haan, sir, main ek baar aapko kitne baje lagau? 12:30 baje lagau kya?

Customer: Main call aapko nahi karta hu call. Meeting hai. Meeting jab khatam hogi, main aapko call karunga.

Executive: Haan, main na aapko WhatsApp pe hi likh de raha hu. Hi likh ke bhej raha hu. Aap jaise hi free hona sir, mujhe text kijiye ga, call kariyega mere number pe na.

Customer: Okay. Haan, toh jo abhi sanshay hai na sir, uske regarding main ek closer feedback bhej raha hu. Uspe aap positive response kar dijiyega. Toh aap mujhe jab bhi free hoke connect kijiye, main aapko help out kar raha hu, thik hai sir?

Customer: Okay, thik hai.

Executive: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving leads.

- Leads are getting sold out quickly.

- Some leads are old or irrelevant.



Resolution:

- Executive identified a lead in West Bengal.

- Executive asked to mark irrelevant leads.

- Offered a video meet for detailed assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after the meeting.

- Executive will send a feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, sold out, irrelevant leads, video meet
